title: Tattoo Transparent Watch Face
summary: Tattoo Transparent Watch Face for Android Wear Clock
description: Fun your friends with transparent Watch Watch Face with Tattoo. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.FEATURES:- 12/24 auto-format- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Tattoo Watch Face4. Enjoy!The watch face has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Fun your friends with transparent Watch Watch Face with Tattoo. Clean and fast watchface for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- 12/24 auto-format
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Tattoo Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The watch face has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: Not very realistic No settings to adjust skin tone. More realistic looking in the pictures than in real life. Not worth a dollar.
I like it, it's a watch face
Was a bit disapointed with the skintone. I understand only one is available, but didnt look as nice as I thought it would.
Refund Not good could not even find the download and when i did the watch looked like, well, lets leave that shall we. you can make this for free and the same color as your skin. Not impressed
Only 1 skin tone. Crazy easy to make it watchmaker with a picture of your own wrist. 0/10 not worth a dollar
